Aroma Games

GO Smell mask are primarily designed for gaming but can also be used in other applications such as education, training, and therapy

FruityOasis

Fruity Oasis is an engaging and innovative VR game that combines action, adventure, and a unique sensory experience. By incorporating the GO Smell mask, players can truly immerse themselves in the lively and enchanting world of the oriental bazaar.

Fruit Combat: Engage in intense fruit battles against evil vendors who hurl fruit at you. Use your fists to punch the fruits or dodge to avoid getting hit. The more accurate your punches and dodges, the higher your score.

Guided Meditation VR

We have added to the magnificent worlds of Guided Meditation thescents of the nature, forest, the ocean breeze and flowers. With over 20 breathtaking environments, a custom audio soundtrack, and handpicked meditative lessons, Guided Meditation VR has become the portal through which individuals from all walks of life can step out of their busy day and into their peaceful world.

Guided Meditation VR is a top-selling app on multiple VR platforms and has won numerous awards in the industry.

Firefighter VR

Firefighter game that incorporates real smoke smell. Cartridges produce non-toxic, safe, and controllable smell of smoke in response to specific game events. Visually immersive environment with realistic fire, smoke, and environmental effects accompanying audio, including crackling fire sounds, sirens, and other relevant audio cues.

Game mechanics to simulate firefighting scenarios realistically. Including tasks like extinguishing fires, rescuing people, navigating through smoke-filled environments, and managing limited resources.

We confidently look to the future with fragrant VR adventures and invite investors and content creators to cooperate.
